document.discussion_title: 36V/48V/60V Hub DC Motor for Twowheeled Self-Balancing Robot
document.topic_text: 1.Q:Before place a order,how can i choose ?A:Please specify the wheel diameter size,width,voltage,power and no-load speed of the required wheel motor. 2.Q:Could I take samples to test quality and market in advance?A:Yes, welcome to take samples to test our quality and service. 3.Q:What's the total cost for samples?A:Total sample cost= sample cost + freightWe will give u the best shipping cost after knowing the wheel size, battery needed or not . 4.Q:How do you ship samples?A:Considering sample quantity is not big, we support ship samples by EMS,TNT or Fedex , fast and less damages. 5.Q:What's your minimum order quantity:A:10sets, one or two samples are ok . 6.Q:Could I use my own forwarder?A:Yes 7.Q:I am new to international business,could you find an experienced forwarder to organize shipment for us?A:Yes, we will assist and guild you to work out the shipping and import process. 8.Q:Is the sample same with formal orders?A:Yes, sample's specification, performance, quality are totally same with formal orders. A:For samples: within 7days; For orders: within 25days.
